### Pre-merge checklist
- [ ] Preview deployment is live and working
- [ ] Tested the happy path on preview URL
- [ ] No console errors in browser dev tools
- [ ] Mobile viewport tested (if UI change)
- [ ] API endpoints return expected responses
- [ ] No hardcoded production URLs in new code
- [ ] Database changes are backwards-compatible
- [ ] CI checks pass (lint, typecheck, unit tests, E2E)
